thread.title: BEAUMONT: One killed, one arrested in single-vehicle crash (UPDATE)
thread.title_full: BEAUMONT: One killed, one arrested in single-vehicle crash (UPDATE) - Press Enterprise

author: ALEX GROVES
title: BEAUMONT: One killed, one arrested in single-vehicle crash (UPDATE)
text:
By ALEX GROVES / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 11, 2015 Updated: Oct. 12, 2015 7:41 a.m. BEAUMONT: One killed, one arrested in single-vehicle crash (UPDATE) Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Related article Â» Beaumont police arrested a 19-year-old man Sunday, Oct. 11 after the vehicle he was driving rolled over and killed one of his passengers, authorities said.
Jacob Mason-Knust of Beaumont fled the scene after the crash and was later found by police and arrested, according to a Beaumont police news release.
Mason-Knust was booked into Larry D. Smith Correctional Facility in Banning on suspicion of felony hit and run.
The rollover crash was reported about 3:08 p.m. in the area of Veile Avenue and 1st Street. Deputies arrived on scene and found that one of the passengers had been ejected from the vehicle and killed, according to the release.
The deceased passenger's name wasn't being released until his family members could be notified. The Riverside County Coroner's Office said Monday that the victim was a 50-year-old male Beaumont resident. The coroner did not reveal the man's name.
Another passenger was found inside the car, unharmed. She was later released, according to the release.
Beaumont police officials are asking anyone who may have witnessed the crash to call the on-duty Watch Commander of the Beaumont Police Department at 951-769-8500.
This is a developing story. Check back for updates.
